text: Basi putani ngondo (mmwe Muhammadi ï·º) petala lya Allah, ngankukanganisyidwa (ya wandu wane) ikaweje mwasyene, soni mwachisyani wakulupilila, mwine Allah kuwa nkugachiga machili ga ngondo ga awala wakanile, sano Allah ni Jwakupundanganya nnope machili, soni Jwakupundanganya nnope pakupeleka ipotesi
